description: A blizzard has stranded you in a warm mountain cabin. Something’s off — and the truth hides in handwritten notes and old photos.

rooms.description: A crackling fire warms the cabin. A photo album rests on the coffee table.
A quilt-covered bed and a half-open wardrobe. The window rattles in the wind.
Stacks of papers and old journals. A typewriter still holds a half-finished note.
